name: Katsu Bubba Kush
description: Katsu Bubba Kush is a unique Bubba Kush phenotype with a deep, floral terpene profile. Representing its genetic namesake in appearance and bud structure, Katsu Bubba’s nugs are dense and resinous. This strain’s high THC content hits the consumer with powerful euphoria that cascades over the body, relaxing and weighing down extremities. Utilize Katsu Bubba Kush to help with insomnia, nausea, and minor pain. Also, anticipate strong appetite stimulation.
descriptionPlain: Katsu Bubba Kush is a unique Bubba Kush phenotype with a deep, floral terpene profile. Representing its genetic namesake in appearance and bud structure, Katsu Bubba’s nugs are dense and resinous. This strain’s high THC content hits the consumer with powerful euphoria that cascades over the body, relaxing and weighing down extremities. Utilize Katsu Bubba Kush to help with insomnia, nausea, and minor pain. Also, anticipate strong appetite stimulation.

highlightedReviews.text: Great smell/flavor, very strong. Solid indica experience, really relaxing but didn't really put me to sleep. Worked well for me as a 7pm chill, bit didn't have me passed out at 8:30.

As you can see I am the INDICA MAN....I get over focused when writing music or working on-a Motorcycle.
I’m 63 yo vet with several disabilities but I walk proudly for those who Can’t!!!
at first who cared when we had nothing if we got busted but as we all aged we had a lot to,lose.l..but thanks to open minded people in government and also remembering it is there job to due the bidding of the people, GOV WOLFE got this voted in and up n runningnin two years !!
OUT STANDING!!!!

So back to Katsu Buuba Kush also reminds me of Alien Bubba Kush pain level so it’s good for socializing.....they key is to know ypur strain, the manufacturer and let em know when u get a bad batch!!!!

What’s best about this is a lot of INDICAS knock you out, but this and Alien Nd OG 18 are all wonderful and quite controllable.....

The problem is US.,,we got used  to smoking bowls n joints...but these 500 mg Live  Resin Cartridges are equal to a GOOD 1/8 to treat them sparingly....two hits  maybe kick your but, or it may barely get your attention....try to do one thing keep your heat temps at the same level about 250* ya don’t want that burnt taste.
so Katsu Bubba Kush is another that a special,box in the pantry should have the BEST STRAINs in it......I think since I killed one last night I’ll go get this and a Space Cake before they run out of them for the season!!!!

Enjoy this wonderful INDICA

Peace
Voodoo Idol
